subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cuauhtémoc Blanco had a goal and an assist to help the host Chicago Fire tie the Red Bulls, 2-2, last night. The Red Bulls (11-10-4) took a 2-1 lead when Juan Pablo Ángel converted a penalty shot in the 69th minute. The Red Bulls remain in third place in the Eastern Conference, a point ahead of Kansas City.
